statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={4.3} , \displaystyle{b}={7.3}, \displaystyle{c}={8.6}, and \displaystyle{d}={11.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={9.4}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
